title: mochi corn cake
ingredients: 2.5 cups corn kernels, preferably fresh cut from 2-3 cobs
1/4 cup butter, melted and cooled slightly, plus more for greasing baking pan
2 cups glutinous rice flour (I use Koda Farms Blue Star Mochiko)
instructions: Preheat oven to 350Â°F non-convection.  Grease a 8x8 or 9x9 square or round pan. Blend corn and coconut milk until very smooth.  Blend in the other ingredients until smooth.  Pour into greased baking tray and knock out bubbles.
Bake for 45 minutes to 1 hour.   Let cool completely then cut.  Store on counter up to 24 hours or fridge for longer.
